org.apache.kudu.client

Class RangePartitionWithCustomHashSchema

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.kudu.client.RangePartition
      • org.apache.kudu.client.RangePartitionWithCustomHashSchema

  • @InterfaceAudience.Public
 @InterfaceStability.Evolving
public class RangePartitionWithCustomHashSchema
extends org.apache.kudu.client.RangePartition
    This class represents a range partition with custom hash bucketing schema. See also RangePartition.

    • Method Detail

      • addHashPartitions

        public org.apache.kudu.client.RangePartition addHashPartitions(List<String> columns,
                                                               int numBuckets,
                                                               int seed)
        Add a level of hash sub-partitioning for this range partition. The hash schema for the range partition is defined by the whole set of its hash sub-partitioning levels. A range partition can have zero or multiple levels of hash sub-partitioning: this method can be called many times on the same object to define a multi-dimensional hash bucketing structure for the range.
        Parameters:
        columns - name of table's columns to use for hash bucketing
        numBuckets - number of buckets used by the hash function
        seed - the seed for the hash function
        Returns:
        this RangePartition object modified accordingly

      • toPB

        public org.apache.kudu.Common.PartitionSchemaPB.RangeWithHashSchemaPB toPB()
